faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to the most common questions about AI agents

items.question: What are AI agents?
items.answer: AI agents are intelligent software programs that can autonomously perform complex tasks. Unlike simple rule-based automations, AI agents can make decisions, learn from experience, and adapt to new situations.

items.question: How long does it take to implement an AI agent?
items.answer: Implementation takes between 2-8 weeks depending on the complexity of the automated process and required integrations. We start with a functional MVP and iterate based on feedback.

items.question: Will AI agents replace employees?
items.answer: No. AI agents take over repetitive and time-consuming tasks, allowing your team to focus on strategic and creative activities that require human judgment.

items.question: What systems can be integrated with AI agents?
items.answer: Our agents integrate with most popular systems: CRM (Salesforce, HubSpot), ERP (SAP, Odoo), ticketing systems, email, chat platforms, and many more.

items.question: What are the costs?
items.answer: Costs depend on the solution's complexity. We offer free consultation to assess needs and propose a solution with transparent budget. Typical ROI is 3-6 months.
